title: Emit explicit unknown records/diagnostics for ambiguous detections
scope: Improve auditability by emitting explicit TrackRecordV1 records for ambiguous detections rather than silently dropping them.
Use trust-first semantics: ambiguous detections become pos_state=unknown with diagnostics.unknown_reason=ambiguous_association.
acceptance: When associations are ambiguous, output includes an explicit record with pos_state=unknown and diagnostics describing ambiguity.
Ambiguity still causes breaks for tracks (break_reason=ambiguous_association) rather than swaps.

deliverables.title: Ambiguity produces explicit unknown records
acceptance: Unknown-record semantics for ambiguity are implemented and documented.
evidence: A unit test demonstrates an ambiguous case yields unknown records plus a break.

subtasks.title: Emit TrackRecordV1 unknown records for ambiguous detections.
done_when: Ambiguous detections are represented as explicit unknown records with diagnostics.
